N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 855.3 - Exceptions

State Regulations

The provisions and requirements of this Part relative to
the maintenance and filing of cargo insurance shall not apply: (a) to trucks used exclusively in the
transportation of crushed stone, sand, gravel, mortar, dirt, debris, coal, logs
and similar commodities that would not be injured by an accident to the
truck; (b) to contract
carriers; (c) to certificated bus
operators authorized to transport packages for compensation as auxiliary to
passenger service. Notes
